author: chris2_2_2
content:
With regards to attending the in-person events mentioned on the core dev call [Community Call*], could I request a channel where these events are posted (and possibly deals on tickets or reserved tickets so they aren't sold out by the time lurkers in the channel hear about them).

Also during meetings could you have the person whose speaking say his name first so we know who is speaking?
